##  peers list

Returns the list of connected peers, including the current node

```
 peers list [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for list
```

```
      --grpc-address string   the GRPC interface (default "127.0.0.1:9632")
      --json                  get all outputs in json format (default false)
```
